caption.center: Freddie LYTALL v. STATE of Mississippi.

opinion.posture: Appeal from Circuit Court, Lee County; Frank A. Russell, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Freddie Lytal, pro se.
Edwin Lloyd Pittman, Atty. Gen. by Henry C. Clay, III, Sp. Asst. Atty. Gen., Jackson, for appellee.
opinion.panel: Before PATTERSON, C.J., and WALKER and ROY NOBLE LEE, P.JJ., and HAWKINS, DAN M. LEE, PRATHER, ROBERTSON, SULLIVAN and ANDERSON, JJ., concur.
